What is this website?

This is a Bible website that contains all books of the typical Orthodox canon, as well as other non canonical writings, gnostic gospels, and the writings of the early church fathers. This website is currently a work in progress so I will be adding more content to expand the library. This website will also eventually have a fully customizable bible layout with note taking.

Who am I?

Omar

What is the goal?

Many bible websites and apps do not give me everyting that I want so I decided to learn how to make my own website that gives me all the informaiton about christianity.
